Hi! I’m a web developer from Mexico City, glad you stopped by

I’m an active member of Mexico City’s growing startup ecosystem. I’ve worked with Nuflick on the past and also worked on several hackathons.

Right now there’s not much to show on this site, but meanwhile you can check out the code I’ve released on my github. I’m interested on web development on Ruby and Javascript, and right now I’m toying with CoffeeScript and iOS Development.
